original_text: So in the lowest parts of the space behind the wall, in open places, I stationed the people by their clans, with their swords, their spears, and their bows.
korean_text: 내가 성벽 뒤의 낮고 넓은 곳에 백성이 그들의 종족을 따라 칼과 창과 활을 가지고 서 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: So in the lowest parts of the space behind the wall,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 성벽 뒤 공간의 가장 낮은 곳에서는,

sentences.original_text: I stationed the people by their clans,
with their swords, their spears, and their bows.
